extendedInfo.description: Enjoy the dragon hunter iceWelcome to dragon hunter ice, more powerful arrow,refined crab boss, more levelsWant to be a dragon hunter? Challenge this tower defense game from Feelingtouch Inc.Attack dragons to guard your castle.How to play:* shoot arrows by moving your fingers on the screen.* earn coins when kill dragons.* collect food use your boat after dragon dead.* use coins to upgrade your arrow, magic power and other property.* repair your castle with your repairman* use your mages to kill them all.Provides:* Weapons like arrow,poison arrow and dizzy arrow. increase your arrow power and arrow numbers.* Repairman that repair your wounded castle. use coins to recruit more repairman to speed up.* Food, Coins and Hunters. hunters will consume food every stage and game over if food not enough.* Magic like Fire mage, Ice mage, Wind mage and light mage, increase your magic power.* Boss with 3 different weapon and magic.email us if any problem or suggestion.thanks

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: This game is simply amazing, an addictive gameplay and interesting upgrades make this one of the best games I\'ve played
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: i like this game
reviews.comment: i love this game its awesome the upgrades,the people,the dragons, are cool and i love dragons and magic :D
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun so far!!!
reviews.comment: Just started playing and only on level 5. I\'m being entertained so far. I would\'ve liked some sort of tutorial to help start off and explain how to play!! Just a suggestion ....
reviews.author: J Wilder

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: I love this game it\'s fun and super addictive I played it for 4 hours straight.
reviews.author: Florencia Vadillo

reviews.title: Awsome
reviews.comment: This is a great game ive been playing for hours and never getting bored...also ive discoved that if u use all magic at the same time u will recieve an achment and then quickly shoot twice and u will have earned 3000000 gold. This might not work if u have recently updated the game
reviews.author: Blade Sculthorpe

reviews.title: BUG !
reviews.comment: it was fub , but sometimes the surface dragon cant even be hit ! wth is that ?! now because of that i stuck at Boss Stage
reviews.author: Rong Quan

reviews.title: Addicted
reviews.comment: Love it. Accept i tried to get free coins and i downloaded another game and played it, then went back to this game and received nothing. Now that was a waste of time.
reviews.author: Derek Hintz

reviews.title: Bad...
reviews.comment: The biggest piece of sht I\'ve ever played, it is also offensive for the dragons.....
reviews.author: WIZZ Gagarang

reviews.title: Not too shabby
reviews.comment: Gig but would be better if it was slightly easier to get gold to buy stuff. 50000 gold is to much for a second arrow when you only get 100 per dragon
reviews.author: George Larkey

reviews.comment: It\'s Stupid, the way y\'all make the arrows shoot like that, very annoying. Plus there\'s no frickin\' tutorial, wth is up with that? Thought I could figure it out but I Guess not.
reviews.author: Hancy Henry Jr

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: I love this game, it keeps you busy and time go fast lol
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool Game :-)
reviews.comment: You better have fast fingers if you want to survive this game!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: It\'s very good like it so far.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Dragon Hunter
reviews.comment: Not a bad little game. Runs well and is fun.
reviews.author: Trevor Onley

reviews.title: Fun game for on the go
reviews.comment: Good game. Kind of like angry birds but with more options and upgrades. Like it so far have seen no problem runs smoothly.
reviews.author: Kevin Rojas

reviews.title: Awesomeness
reviews.comment: Quick, easy and addicting. These are the kind of games I want to see more of, keep them coming guys!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Off screen dragons
reviews.comment: Sometimes sea dragons appear off screen. Gets more annoying at later stages when you get more than 1 off screen sea dragons.    Fun game but 2 stars. Very annoying off screen sea dragons. Would have had 3 stars if the kill credits would roll over to the next replay after death.
reviews.author: Tony Chiang

reviews.title: great game let down by crashes
reviews.comment: as the title says the game is really really fun one of the best games you can get for free imo but the crashes on my SII prevents me from going any further otherwise it would be a 5* game
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent game
reviews.comment: Great game I love I was actually addicted but I just got out of being addicted a good time passer
reviews.author: Alex Colon

reviews.title: Quite good
reviews.comment: Quite good but it should recommend about out of gold in game and improve more about graphic
reviews.author: Duong Duong
